name: Alternative Memories
description:
Demo containing first 4 out of planned 5 stages.   Full game early 2023.

A lot of bullets, surreal colorful scenery and a lot of music.  Shoot down enemies while avoiding getting hit  on the red dot inside your player character!

Use bombs for survival or use them  with for massive points from bullet cancelling. Extends for every 100000 points collected.

Example run of the game from my youtube channel

Read readme.txt for additional information. 

WARNING: This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.

Made with SHMUP CREATOR.

All feedback is greatly appreciated! :https://forms.gle/WjBfmYSrp5z33kMN9
